human.notes: Widely adaptable; prevalent in low-essence regions.

elf.notes: Long-lived; fine attunement to ritual traces.

Towns with mixed loyalties; individuals may aid either side.

trade_and_geography.distant_markets: Far-off cities host wealthy buyers; demand fuels slaver routes.

entries.text: Shifters bind to a spirit animal; puberty unlocks partial/true forms.
Humans adapt quickly; small charms bridge essence gaps.
Elves read ritual traces like currents; patient and precise.
Damp glades, ward-scarred roots, old paths watched by quiet eyes.
Distant cities drive demand; caravans pay for silence and speed.
